simd_quaternion(_:) Functionsimd_quaternion(_:)func simd_quaternion(_ xyzr: simd_half4) -> simd_quathDiscussionConstructs a quaternion from a four-element vector.

Note that the imaginary (vector) part of the quaternion comes from lanes 0, 1, and 2 of the vector, and the real (scalar) part comes from lane 3.

# simd_quaternion(_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ simd ](/documentation/simd)

-  simd_quaternion(_:) 

Function# simd_quaternion(_:)



```
func simd_quaternion(_ xyzr: simd_half4) -> simd_quath
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/simd/simd_quaternion(_:)-4565s#discussion)

Constructs a quaternion from a four-element vector.

Note that the imaginary (vector) part of the quaternion comes from lanes 0, 1, and 2 of the vector, and the real (scalar) part comes from lane 3.
